Articles.Content:
If one wonders what this monstrosity is, it's the Hellcat V which is based on a fighter craft from Wing Commander III: Heart of the Tiger. This craft may lag a bit because it has a lot of parts on it...

It can definitely fly, but will be unstable once it reaches the stratosphere. It pitches up a lot...

Craft: http://www./view/jfxp6gqd6cv7p74/Hellcat_V_mk_II.craft

I called this a Mk. II because the earlier design was longer...

that is beutiful... strap it to a rocket and send it to space as a shuttle and i'm complete.

then you can do starfox stuff and land places and just do stuff thats AMAZING!
Interesting... now I wonder if its possible to do a Dralthi....

Interesting... now I wonder if its possible to do a Dralthi....

Actually, I do have a Dralthi. I just haven't made any screenshots of it. It's not perfect, but at least it's airworthy...
